name: Orion (itch) (Axel Arnaud)
description:
Orion is a very small game that I did with my team for a 6-week project.

We had to create the project of a promotional ARG on the universe of The War of The Worlds including another little game.

Orion is this little game we made to hide some clues for our ARG.

If you think you have found what we have hidden, feel free to share your discovery with us!
